exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="DragAcceptSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="img" source="4_png" y="-1" scaleX="0.33" scaleY="0.33" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="image_18_png" x="0" y="125"/>
	<e:Label id="txtName" text="mother" y="138" fontFamily="黑体" width="140" anchorOffsetX="0" verticalAlign="top" textAlign="center" x="10" textColor="0x333333" size="22"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="DragItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="171" height="53">
	<e:Image id="img" source="image_24_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameOverSkin" width="960" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="background1_jpg" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Image source="game_15_png" y="91" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="gold_png" x="398.04" y="271" anchorOffsetX="0" width="109.33" anchorOffsetY="0" height="108.33"/>
	<e:Label id="tf_total" text="1" x="496.95" y="302.29" size="40" stroke="3" anchorOffsetX="0" width="92" strokeColor="0x836465" textColor="0xffe41f"/>
	<e:Label id="tf_evalue" text="exellent" y="187.66" anchorOffsetX="0" width="553.33" anchorOffsetY="0" height="88.67" size="48" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor="0xe15f5f" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="katong"/>
	<e:Label id="tf_score" text="exellent" y="382.99" anchorOffsetX="0" width="553.33" anchorOffsetY="0" height="88.67" size="36" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="0" textColor="0xfffcfc" strokeColor="0xa6714a" stroke="5" fontFamily="katong"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_restart" label="" y="509" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="Button_12_png" source.down="Button_12_png" source.disabled="Button_12_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" height="640" width="960">
    <e:Image x="0" y="0" source="background1_jpg" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image source="image_03_png" x="47.8" y="77.09"/>
	<ns1:GameDragItem id="drag_0" skinName="DragItemSkin" y="97.55" x="70.85"/>
	<ns1:GameDragItem id="drag_1" skinName="DragItemSkin" y="155.55" x="70.85"/>
	<ns1:GameDragItem id="drag_2" skinName="DragItemSkin" y="216.55" x="70.85"/>
	<ns1:GameDragItem id="drag_3" skinName="DragItemSkin" y="280.55" x="70.85"/>
	<ns1:GameDragItem id="drag_4" skinName="DragItemSkin" y="341.55" x="70.85"/>
	<ns1:GameDragItem id="drag_5" skinName="DragItemSkin" y="400.55" x="70.85"/>
	<e:Image source="image_09_png" x="450.71" y="171.21"/>
    <ns1:GameDragAcceptItem id="drag_ac_4" y="23.7" x="329.8" skinName="DragAcceptSkin"/>
	<ns1:GameDragAcceptItem id="drag_ac_0" skinName="DragAcceptSkin" y="213.7" x="328.8"/>
	<ns1:GameDragAcceptItem id="drag_ac_2" skinName="DragAcceptSkin" y="403.7" x="328.8"/>
	<ns1:GameDragAcceptItem id="drag_ac_3" skinName="DragAcceptSkin" y="403.7" x="524.8"/>
	<ns1:GameDragAcceptItem id="drag_ac_1" skinName="DragAcceptSkin" y="213.7" x="524.8"/>
	<ns1:GameDragAcceptItem id="drag_ac_5" skinName="DragAcceptSkin" y="23.7" x="526.8"/>
	<e:Image id="btn" source="check_png" x="718.15" y="531.77"/>
	<e:Image source="gold_png" x="55.65" y="513.4" anchorOffsetX="0" width="109.33" anchorOffsetY="0" height="108.33"/>
	<e:Label id="tf_total" text="0" x="123.61" y="516.87" size="40" stroke="3" anchorOffsetX="0" width="92" strokeColor="0x836465" textColor="0xFFE41F"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameStartSkin" width="960" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="background_jpg" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Label text="游戏规则" y="106.67" size="42" textColor="0xea5b5c" x="398.67" bold="true" fontFamily="katong"/>
	<e:Label text="规则说明" y="180.34" anchorOffsetX="0" width="357.34" anchorOffsetY="0" height="167.34" x="296.34" textColor="0x7c5b3a" bold="true" fontFamily="katong"/>
	<e:Label text="游戏最高分：6" y="353.67" anchorOffsetX="0" width="602.67" anchorOffsetY="0" height="50" x="176.33" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0x7c5b3a" fontFamily="katong"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_start" label="" y="414.33" x="369.99">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="Button_22_png" source.down="Button_22_png" source.disabled="Button_22_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ScoreSkin" width="194" height="96" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="gold_png" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" width="93.34" anchorOffsetY="0" height="89.67"/>
	<e:Label id="tf_score" text="123" x="90.99" y="17.66" size="50" strokeColor="0xAA9945" stroke="2" anchorOffsetX="0" width="92"/>
</e:Skin>
